# animact

Anime-themed action and reaction image API wrapper for Python.

![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/animact)
![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/monabborhossain/animact)

---

## ✨ Features

- Simple API to fetch anime reaction/action images
- Over 50+ categories: hug, pat, slap, wave, etc.
- Minimal dependencies (Only httpx)
- Simple and easy-to-use

---

## 🚀 Installation

```bash
pip install animact
```

---

## 🧪 Example

```python
import animact

img_url = animact.hug()
print(img_url)  # Outputs a random hug image URL
```

---

## 📚 Available Actions

- lurk
- shoot
- sleep
- shrug
- stare
- wave
- poke
- smile
- peck
- wink
- blush
- smug
- tickle
- yeet
- think
- highfive
- feed
- bite
- bored
- nom
- yawn
- facepalm
- cuddle
- kick
- happy
- hug
- baka
- pat
- angry
- run
- nod
- nope
- kiss
- dance
- punch
- handshake
- slap
- cry
- pout
- handhold
- thumbsup
- laugh
- bully
- lick
- bonk
- glomp
- kill
- cringe
- spank
